testcase.name: Verify POST request to post data into program with valid base URL and valid data
testcase.system-out: Given User sets request for Program module with valid base URL and valid request body.passed When User sends POST request with data from "postvaliddataprogram" and 0....passed Then Request should be successfull with status code "201" for POST request..passed

testcase.name: Verify POST request to post data into program with invalid base URL and valid data
testcase.system-out: Given User sets request for Program module with invalid base URL and valid request body.passed When User sends POST request with invalid URL and data from "postvaliddataprogram" and 1.passed Then Bad request error message should be displayed with status code "404" for POST request with invalid URL.passed

testcase.name: Verify POST request to post data into program with valid URL and no data
testcase.system-out: Given User sets request for Program module with valid base URL and empty request body.passed When User sends POST request with empty request body........................passed Then Bad request error message should be displayed with status code "400" for POST request with empty request body.passed

testcase.name: Verify POST request to post data into program with valid base URL and invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given User sets request for Program module with valid base URL and invalid data.passed When User sends POST request without programName parameter in request body from "NoProgramName" and 0.passed Then Bad request error message should be displayed with status code "400"...passed

testcase.name: Verify POST request to post data into program with valid base URL and invalid data 2
testcase.system-out: Given User sets request for Program module with valid base URL and invalid data.passed When User sends POST request with null value for programName parameter from "RequestBodyInvalidData" and 0.passed Then Bad request error message should be displayed with status code "400"...passed
